page.title: 20ELECTRICITY
page.content: Electricity comes to our villages through pylons which are tall steel giants striding over the land. Telegraph poles are supports that carry telephone wires to our homes so we can communicate with people all over the world.18 wooden telegraph poles can be seen from Crick School grounds.The electricity pylons carry electricity to our homes so that we can have hot water,use washing machines,cookers,fridges,kettles, radios.lights,televisions,videos, computers etc. We tend to take electricity for granted these days, but 160 yrs ago people would have had no vision of how it could have changed their life to make it easier. One example- we can now sit at home in Crick and watch what is happening in Africa, Australia etc.
